amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $10 million from truth-in-sentencing prison grant funding to the community-oriented police services crime identification technology program.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 35 printed in the Congressional Record. to increase funding for the Criminal Identification Technology Program by $10 million with offsets from the truth-in- sentencing grant program.
